title: The Devil and Leroy Bassett 1973 (Action, Drama) Cody Bearpaw, John F. Goff | Movie

sources.title: The Devil and Leroy Bassett 1973 (Action, Drama) Cody Bearpaw, John F. Goff | Movie
sources.description:
A Tale of Hillbilly Hate and Redneck Revenge!
Leroy Bassett and his dim-witted brothers go on the lam after freeing their friend Keema from jail.
 
Original title: The Devil and Leroy Bassett (1973) AKA: Pistol-Packin' Leroy

This film has many subtitle language options

Director & Writer: Robert E. Pearson 
Stars: Cody Bearpaw, John F. Goff, George 'Buck' Flower 
Genres: Action, Drama


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:05 A tale of family conflict, religious beliefs, and a plan to rescue a brother from jail.
06:54 A plan to trade a warm beer for a police car unfolds during a conversation about getting a prisoner out of jail.
12:55 The mysterious disappearance of Keema and the events leading up to it in a small town.
22:19 A tale of crime and revenge unfolds in a small town involving Sheriff Trask, Keema, Wilbur, and Leroy.
31:37 A sheriff faces challenges from old acquaintances, contemplates retirement, and makes a significant decision over a meal.
38:48 A tale of conflict and redemption unfolds in a small town, involving a troubled individual and the local sheriff.
48:21 A family encounters unexpected trouble on a remote property, leading to a tense situation with law enforcement.
51:56 Family drama unfolds as a man seeks dental help from an unexpected source, leading to conflict and resentment.
1:03:35 A man named Wilbur faces a series of unfortunate events involving his family and Leroy Bassett.
1:07:44 Conflict escalates as Leroy Bassett threatens violence and challenges authority figures in a tense situation.
1:16:00 Pursuit of Leroy Bassett leads to a deadly showdown in the mountains.
